title: Life After Death - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/23/22
itunes:title: Life After Death - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/23/22
description:
George Noory and authors Stephen Simon and Sandra Champlain discuss their research into the afterlife, how Hollywood movies have explored the concepts of angels and simulated realities, and why people are becoming more comfortable disclosing their own paranormal experiences.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
